tool_description:
1000 free API calls per day!

Access Real-Time Raw and Parsed WHOIS Data for Domain Names and Check Domain Availability via Free Whois API.

Powered by gwhois.co
name: Whois Api Free
title: Whois Api Free

api_list.name: Domain Name Whois
Supported TLDs
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whois-api-free.p.rapidapi.com/api/tlds"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whois-api-free.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://whois-api-free.p.rapidapi.com/api/tlds"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whois-api-free.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
